introduction: Scotland's ancient clans are renowned as some of the most legendary warriors in history - fierce tribes forged by the country's wild mountains and glens. This is their thrilling story of heroism and villainy, featuring Scotland's most iconic characters - from Robert the Bruce to Mary, Queen of Scots. Find out how the united clans defeated Europe's greatest military power to claim Scottish independence, and how they used their influence to topple rulers and change the course of history. This is the real-life Scottish game of thrones: an epic struggle for power, told from the point of view of the feuding clans.From the fall of the Stuart kings to the rise of Bonnie Prince Charlie, this series journeys through one of the most explosive periods in British history. The clans - still clashing with each other - face brutal civil war, dirty double-dealing from the legendary Rob Roy MacGregor, and a doom-laden challenge from a new king. Blood and betrayal are around every corner. Can the clans survive?
